CustomField.formula:
IF ( Is_Tariff_Condition__c = TRUE,
Base_TO_Tariff_Nego__c * Value_per__c/100, Base_TO_Nego__c * Value_per__c/100 )
+ (Value_amt__c - IF(Is_Excluded_To_Nego_Base_F__c,IF(Exclusion_to_Nego_Base_Value__c==0,Value_amt__c,Exclusion_to_Nego_Base_Value__c) ,0))* IF( Base_TO_Nego_YearBase__c <> 0 && Is_Yearly_Condition__c, Base_TO_Nego__c /Base_TO_Nego_YearBase__c, 1)
+ Base_Quantity_Nego__c * unit_amount__c
CustomField.label: YTD Nego
